meanings.definition: A person who takes particular pleasure in fine food and drink.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a true epicure, always seeking out the best restaurants in town.
meanings.sent2: The epicure savored every bite of the gourmet meal, appreciating the flavors and textures.
meanings.sent3: The epicure joked that he could taste the happiness in the delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her palate was like that of an epicure, able to discern the subtlest of flavors.
meanings.sent5: As an epicure, he believed that good food was the key to a happy life.

meanings.definition: Fond of or adapted to luxury or indulgence in sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: The hotel room was decorated in an epicure style, with plush furnishings and elegant decor.
meanings.sent2: She led an epicure lifestyle, enjoying spa days and extravagant vacations.
meanings.sent3: The epicure cat lounged on a velvet cushion, living a life of luxury.
meanings.sent4: The epicure sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink, a feast for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The epicure garden was filled with exotic flowers and fragrant herbs, a paradise for the senses.
